subject: Football (College)
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kenna, the quarterback on Army’s undefeated national championship team of 1944, went on to become a corporate executive and president of the National Association of Manufacturers.
snippet: Mr. Kenna, the quarterback on Army’s undefeated national championship team of 1944, went on to become a corporate executive and president of the National Association of Manufacturers.
